about_the_game:
Shape a fertile landscape from humble camps to thriving medieval realms filled with hope and bustling with life.

An open ear and wise decisions are essential to building a prosperous metropolis. But don’t fret my Liege; you are not alone. Companions with invaluable skills and varied stories will aid you in this endeavour as their fates become intertwined with your City Tales.

In your hands lies the fate of your people, and this tale is yours to tell!

  • Organic cities: Forsake rigid grids and shape large cities that evolve naturally.

  • Swift, Strategic Economy: Balance resources and citizens’ needs to shape your city’s prosperity.

  • Companion-driven tales: Forge bonds with your companions, hone their skills, and discover their stories as your city grows.

  • Unique cities: No two cities are the same. Each district has its own vibrant charm and needs.

Natural growth, organic path

Cast off the chains of rigid design and craft free-flowing cities. Pathways trodden by villagers carve organic winding roads, forming an ever-evolving landscape as your city and farmlands flourish.

For all walks of life

Each district has its own personality, needs, and desires. Some citizens will love a tavern, whilst others prefer the peace of a church. But each area will evolve based on your choices.

A Swift and Impactful Economy

Guide the pulse of a bustling economy. Balance resources with swift, wise decisions and lay the groundwork for your city to rise like a beacon of medieval might.

Friends, foes and advisors

Unveil tales of fortune and sorrow in each city. Companions of wit and skill bring strength and knowledge to your city’s economy and story alike. Your choices may alter their fates, binding you further to the land and its people.

A canvas full of tales

City Tales is graced with a gentle atmosphere and a hand-painted vibrance, breathing warmth and wonder into every stone and timber.

Whether you choose to optimize your production chains, pursue one’s quest for truth or help them grow their skills, this Tale is fully yours to tell and your decisions will determine how your city unfolds.

City Tales is made with love by a small, passionate team. Join us on Discord and help us improve the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: CPU Intel® Core™ i5-7600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-13600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX3070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: City Tales is a medieval strategic city builder with an organic building system, allowing you to create vast cities where every stone tells a tale. Balance your resources and plan each district whilst the lives of your companions and people unfold.
